ManType.description: The different model this NPC should use.

BodyColour.description: The colour of this person's clothes (or skin?)

HairColour.description: The colour of this person's hair?

TalkEvent.description: LUA Event to trigger when talking to this NPC?

Target.description: Where this NPC tries to walk to?

TargetActor.description: What object this NPC tries to walk to?

Brain.description: What AI this NPC should use?

NoRangeOut.description: Prevent this NPC from being culled out at range?

NoDodge.description: Prevent this NPC from dodging out of the way of things like the Spin Dash?
